name: On Key Up: A Game for Keyboards
name_original: On Key Up: A Game for Keyboards
description:
Your keyboard is now a physics playground! The game's virtual keyboard maps to your real keyboard, allowing you to push balls and cubes around with each key press.



Leverage the game's physics to solve various challenges in record timing. These include:

  • Painting the keyboard keys
  • Collecting coins
  • Rolling a pair of dice
  • Balancing objects upright
  • Tossing a ball through a hoop
  • ...with plenty more to come!
